price: (Aheman no mu nnua no) nwunu no bεbεn akata wͻn so, na emu nnuaba no nso bεbεn wͻn paa (ama ne teε ayε mmrε ama wͻn).
arabic: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيۡهِمۡ ظِلَٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتۡ قُطُوفُهَا تَذۡلِيلٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wadāniyatan ʿalayhim ẓilāluhā wadhullilat quṭūfuhā tadhlīlan
